Officer.definition: one charged with administering or enforcing the law [a police ] 2

1.definition: one charged with administering or enforcing the law [a police ]

2.definition: one who holds an office of trust, authority, or command [the directors,, employees, and shareholders of a corporation]
2.s: employees, and shareholders of a corporatio

3.definition: one who holds a position of authority or command in the armed forces [insubordinate to his commanding ]
